section.title: configuration of products module Configure Products
section.para: To configure the Products module, select the "Configure Products" option. The following screen will appear:
When configuring the Products module, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to enable the system's Work Center Routings capability. If not selected, users will be prevented from creating Work Centers, entering Bills of Operations (BOOs), or performing any tasks related to Operations posting, etc. If your system has Work Center Routings defined, this option will be hidden.
Machine Overhead: If Work Center Routings are enabled, select one of the following methods for tracking machine overhead:

Select to track machine overhead separately from other overhead Costs, using the machine overhead rate specified in a Work Center master. Any associated Costs will display in the system-defined "Machine Overhead" Costing Element.
Select to track machine overhead in the same category as other overhead Costs. Any associated Costs will display in the system-defined "Overhead" Costing Element. (This is the default setting.)

Select to enable the system's Breeder Bill of Materials capability. If not selected, users will be prevented from entering Breeder Bills of Materials (BOMs) or performing any tasks related to posting production for Breeder BOMs, etc.
Select to enable the system's Item Transformation capability. If not selected, users will be prevented from performing tasks related to Item Transformations.

varlistentry.term: Post Item Changes to the Change Log

listitem.para: Select to post to the Change Log any changes made to Item masters.

varlistentry.term: Allow Inactive Items to be Added to BOMs

listitem.para: Select to allow inactive Items to be added to Bills of Materials.
Specify preferences for the following defaults:

varlistentry.term: Set Sold Items as exclusive as default configuration Exclusive

listitem.para: Select to mark all sold Items as "Exclusive" by default whenever a new Item is created.
Select one of the available default issue methods.
Select to issue materials to a Work Order by a specific material issue transaction.
Select to issue materials to a Work Order by a material backflush.
Select to issue materials to a Work Order based on the issue method applied to the materials initially--that is, either pull or push.

tip.para: The default settings "Set Sold Items as Exclusive" and "W/O Material Issue Method" only apply to newly-created Items. They cannot be used to retroactively update already existing Items.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Cancels any configuration settings, returning you to the application desktop.
Saves the configuration settings, returning you to the application desktop.
